doc.field: Cross & Brown Company architectural photograph collection
Cross & Brown Company architectural photograph collection

Series IV consists of a variety of documents relating to buildings depicted in Series I through III. Most of the materials were created to be used in conjunction with photographs in Cross & Brown Company's brochures and other promotional materials; both finished and rough copies of these brochures are available in this series. The series is arranged by Manhattan address, with named streets filed alphabetically followed by numbered avenues and numbered streets. A list of exclusive agency listings for 1980, 1984, and 1985 is filed at the end of the series.
Cross & Brown Company architectural photograph collection
